Package org.apache.groovy.ginq.provider.collection.runtime

Interface Window<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of Window element
All Superinterfaces:
Queryable<T>
public interface Window<T> extends Queryable<T>
Represents window which stores elements used by window functions
Since:
4.0.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.groovy.ginq.provider.collection.runtime.Queryable

    Queryable.Order<T,U extends Comparable<? super U>>
